basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Andres Mills Gallego. I am a full stack software developer.  I am also a first generation immigrant  from Colombia, South America.  I now live and work in Seattle, Wa.I am a lifelong woodworker who loves to learn new things. My background is in construction where my strengths were definitely problem solving and implementing the clientâ€™s vision.  I leaned into these strengths, as well as a love for the creative side of the industry and started my own business 16 years ago. When I started I was the sole employee, but after many years of hard work and dedication I grew my business into one of the most respected in the area. A lot of the same skills that I was able to develop while being a business owner, craftsman and contractor translate seamlessly into the world of software development.  Strong communication, the ability to work with a team and the need to problem solve when necessary are all skills that I enjoy utilizing while working as a software developer. Thank you ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Collector Catalog
projects.description: An app that allows a collector to catalog their collection and all the pertinent details for their items.  The user is also able to render their collection onto the site so that they may display their collection for others to see.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: The infamous Salmon Cookies project! This project was built with the idea of providing data to a store owner to forecast potential sales. This project uses a nice balance of HTML, JavaScript and a hefty does of CSS for styling

projects.title: To Do List
projects.description: This was a personal project that I built to practice my skills.  A simple To Do list that utilized local storage.  It links to github, spotify and has a dark mode that can be toggled on/off
